dcterms:creator: V. I. Kozik
E. S. Nezhevenko
A. S. Feoktistov
dcterms:description: An active fire dataset from the Visible Infrared Imaging Radiometer Suite (VIIRS) for the years 2012–2014, containing data points within a bounding box of South Africa, including variables such as latitude, longitude, time, date, and fire radiative power (FRP).
dcterms:title: Active Fire Dataset from VIIRS

dcterms:creator: R. C. Rothermel
dcterms:description: Rothermel's model for predicting fire spread in wildland fuels, which characterizes the process of heat transfer of the fire and provides feedback on the heat release intensity, burning time, and velocity of fire propagation.
dcterms:title: Rothermel’s Model for Forest Fire Propagation

dcterms:creator: T. Katte
dcterms:description: The Penn TreeBank dataset, which is used for evaluating recurrent neural network architectures in the context of language modeling and other natural language processing tasks.
dcterms:title: Penn TreeBank Dataset

dcterms:creator: R. Jozefowicz
W. Zaremba
I. Sutskever
dcterms:description: A synthetic XML dataset used for empirical exploration of recurrent network architectures, particularly in the context of character prediction tasks.
dcterms:title: Synthetic XML Dataset
